snippet.title: Lynked: Banner of the Spark | 1.0 and Console Announcement Trailer | Coming May 22, 2025
snippet.description:
Lynked: Banner of the Spark is launching into 1.0 and coming to Steam, Xbox Series X|S, and PlayStation 5 on May 22, 2025!

Build a bright new world alongside a band of rescued robot buddies! In this colorful action RPG, battle waves of enemies in solo or co-op, then return home and use their parts to craft a thriving town. Assemble your crew and grow stronger with each new adventure!

⬩ PlayStation: https://lynked.gg/playstation 
⬩ Xbox: https://lynked.gg/xbox 
⬩ Steam Page: https://lynked.gg/steam 
⬩ Join our Discord:   / https://discord.gg/playlynked
⬩ Social Media: https://linktr.ee/playlynked 
⬩ Official Website: https://playlynked.com 

Join the resistance when Lynked: Banner of the Spark launches May 22, 2025 – Get ready to fight, build, and uncover the past!
